messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2427
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/2/02 2:43:29 PM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/2/02 2:43:29 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< . As
they want my attention when they go to bed then I need them to go before I
am too sleepy to give it too them. If they are still awake at nine o'clock
I am past being able to do much for them so they don't get a story as I am
likely to have already climbed in my bed. But I find that if they get in
bed by eight I can easily read to them for 40 minutes or so and get a second
wind and stay up for several more hours with my husband. >>
